# Regen Studio

> Regenerative innovation design studio helping organizations create systemic
> positive impact at the intersection of technology, society, and nature.
> Based in The Netherlands and Brazil. Founded in 2023.

## What We Do
- Digital Product Passport advisory (independent, vendor-neutral)
- Innovation design services (10 methodologies for complex multi-stakeholder environments)
- Vision & strategy for regenerative systems
- Visual storytelling for systemic innovation
- Energy transition & community energy design
- Circular economy & business model design

## Focus Areas
- Circular Economy: DPP compliance, circular business models, ESPR advisory
- Energy Transition: Smart grids, energy communities, energy justice
- Liveable Cities: Living labs, digital participation, urban greening
- Resilient Nature: Bioacoustics, reforestation, biodiversity monitoring
- Digital Society: Digital identity, privacy-by-design, AI governance

## Key Regulations We Advise On
- ESPR (Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation)
- EU Battery Regulation 2023/1542 — DPP mandatory from Feb 2027
- Construction Products Regulation 2024/3110 — 37 product families
- Toy Safety Regulation 2025/2509
- Packaging & Packaging Waste Regulation 2025/40
- Textiles delegated act (in preparation)

## Innovation Services
1. **Problem Analysis** — Find root causes of complex challenges through systems mapping and stakeholder analysis
2. **Ideation** — Sketch future possibilities using structured creative sessions and divergent thinking
3. **Prototyping** — Build rough solutions rapidly to test concepts before committing resources
4. **Solution Validation** — Pass all checks by testing prototypes against real-world requirements and stakeholder needs
5. **Experiment Design** — Test solutions in practice through structured experiments with measurable outcomes
6. **Design Sprints** — Innovation pressure cooker: compress months of work into focused multi-day sessions
7. **Innovation Process Design** — Create a custom innovation framework tailored to your organisation's context
8. **Innovation System Design** — Build co-creation communities and multi-stakeholder innovation ecosystems
9. **Innovation Coaching** — Provide ongoing support to teams navigating innovation journeys
10. **Innovation Management** — Effective innovation operations: portfolio management, governance, and scaling

## Interactive Demos
- [CPR DPP Tracker](https://demos.regenstudio.world): Track all 37 CPR product families and harmonised standards progress
- [Battery Passport Checker](https://demos.regenstudio.world): Free 1-minute tool to assess DPP obligations under EU Battery Regulation
- [DPP System](https://demos.regenstudio.world): Full product passport platform prototype (restricted, request access)
- [EDI Wallet](https://demos.regenstudio.world): European Digital Identity wallet prototype with selective disclosure (restricted, request access)
- [AI Tax → UBI](https://demos.regenstudio.world): Policy simulation exploring AI taxation and universal basic income

## FAQ Topics
The FAQ page covers 47 questions across 8 topic areas:
- **About Regen Studio** — What the studio does, where it is based, client types, regenerative innovation philosophy, privacy approach
- **EU Regulations** — ESPR, EU Battery Regulation, CPR, Toy Safety Regulation, PPWR, textiles delegated act, Detergents Regulation
- **Circular Economy** — What DPPs are, who needs them, what data they contain, compliance timelines, DPP readiness assessments, circular business models, vendor-neutral advisory
- **Energy Transition** — Energy communities, energy justice, smart grids, the Slim Strandnet project
- **Liveable Cities** — Living labs and participatory urban design
- **Digital Society** — Digital identity, eIDAS 2.0, EDI wallets, self-sovereign identity, verifiable credentials, selective disclosure, privacy-by-design
- **Resilient Nature** — Bioacoustics monitoring for biodiversity
- **Innovation Services** — Innovation design services, design sprints, innovation process and system design, innovation coaching
- **Interactive Demos & Tools** — CPR DPP Tracker, Battery Passport Checker, restricted demo access

## Locations
- The Netherlands: Regen Studio B.V., Berg en Dal (KVK 90337948)
- Brazil: Regen Studio Consultoria LTDA, Sao Paulo (CNPJ 57.579.114/0001-55)

## Pages
- [Home](https://www.regenstudio.world): Vision, focus areas, services overview, and client types
- [Digital Product Passports](https://www.regenstudio.world/digital-product-passports/): DPP advisory services, readiness assessments, compliance roadmaps
- [What is a Digital Product Passport?](https://www.regenstudio.world/what-is-a-digital-product-passport/): Comprehensive Q&A on DPPs — what they contain, which regulations require them, who needs to comply, timelines
- [What is the ESPR?](https://www.regenstudio.world/what-is-espr/): Guide to the Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation — purpose, scope, DPP requirements, timelines
- [What is the Construction Products Regulation?](https://www.regenstudio.world/what-is-the-construction-products-regulation/): Q&A on CPR 2024/3110 — scope, 37 product families, harmonised standards, DPP requirements, timelines
- [Innovation Services](https://www.regenstudio.world/innovation-services.html): 10 innovation design methodologies for complex multi-stakeholder environments
- [What is Innovation Design?](https://www.regenstudio.world/what-is-innovation-design/): Q&A on innovation design — 10 services, design sprints, living labs, innovation process design, case studies
- [Blog](https://www.regenstudio.world/blog.html): Analysis of EU regulations, project case studies, and innovation insights
- [FAQ](https://www.regenstudio.world/faq.html): 47 questions covering DPPs, EU regulations, energy transition, circular economy, and more
- [About](https://www.regenstudio.world/about.html): Team, philosophy, and company background
- [Digital Identities](https://www.regenstudio.world/digital-identities/): Self-sovereign identity and eIDAS 2.0 advisory
- [What is eIDAS 2.0?](https://www.regenstudio.world/what-is-eidas/): Q&A on eIDAS 2.0 — European Digital Identity Wallets, verifiable credentials, timeline, member state implementation
- [What is the EDI Wallet?](https://www.regenstudio.world/what-is-the-edi-wallet/): Q&A on the European Digital Identity Wallet — how it works, selective disclosure, verifiable credentials, SSI
- [Client Projects](https://www.regenstudio.world/client-projects.html): Selected project portfolio
- [Privacy Policy](https://www.regenstudio.world/privacy.html): Zero cookies, self-hosted assets, GDPR/LGPD compliant
- [Interactive Demos](https://demos.regenstudio.world): Five demo tools for DPP, digital identity, and policy simulation
